short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance Letterboxd with cleaner movie cards, instant search suggestions, and various quality of life improvements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎬 Cleaner movie cards
🔍 Instant search suggestions
🚫 Hide useless filters, sorts, or navbar items
✨ Various quality of life improvements
🔓 Open source & free - find the GitHub repo here:
       https://github.com/JSerwatka/letterboxd-tweaks

⚠️ Some options require being logged in to Letterboxd
_________________________________________________________
 
                               🛠️ HOW DOES IT WORK
_________________________________________________________

1. Upon installing the extension, several default options, like better search and film cards, are enabled automatically.
2. To change options, click the extension's icon and select your preferences.
3. Each option has a description. To see visual comparisons, right-click the icon and select "Options" to view before-and-after images for each feature.

_________________________________________________________

                                  🔐 PRIVACY POLICY
_________________________________________________________

Letterboxd Tweaks extension does not analyze or send any user data. All the essential data needed for the extension to function, such as your selected themes and color scheme preferences, are stored locally within your browser.
